text: Honkytonk Man is a 1982 American musical comedy-drama movie directed by Clint Eastwood (who also stars) and also starring Kyle Eastwood, John McIntire, Alexa Kenin, Verna Broom, Barry Corbin, Marty Robbins, Jerry Haddin, Tim Thomerson. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was based on the 1980 novel of the same name by Clancy Carlile. It was nominated for Razzie Award in 1983. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 musical movies Category:1982 comedy-drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood
title: Honkytonk Man
